mapper.update: update alg_module_usage set mod_sn = #{modSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star_cnt = #{starCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, follow_cnt = #{followCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, call_cnt = #{callCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, credit_cnt = #{creditCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where usg_sn = #{usgSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select usg_sn, mod_sn, star_cnt, follow_cnt, call_cnt, credit_cnt from alg_module_usage
mapper.update: update alg_module_usage set mod_sn = #{modSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star_cnt = #{starCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, follow_cnt = #{followCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, call_cnt = #{callCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, credit_cnt = #{creditCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where mod_sn = #{modSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
